doc.title: 汪云云
doc.body: 研究方向：模式识别、机器学习研究内容：主要研究模式分类、分类器设计，目前主要研究兴趣为半监督分类器设计。代表性论著：[1] Yunyun Wang, Songcan Chen: Safety-Aware Semi-Supervised Classification. IEEE Transaction on Neural Networks and Learning Systems, 24(11): 1763-1772[2] Yunyun Wang, Songcan Chen, Zhi-Hua Zhou, New Semi-Supervised Classification Method Based on Modified Cluster Assumption. IEEE Transaction on Neural Networks and Learning Systems, 23(5): 689-702, 2012[3] Yunyun Wang, Songcan Chen, Hui Xue, Can under-exploited structure of original-classes help ECOC-based multi-class classification?. Neurocomputing 89: 158-167, 2012 [4] Yunyun Wang, Songcan Chen, Hui Xue, Support Vector Machine incorporated with feature discrimination. Expert Systems with Applications, 38(10): 12506-12513, 2011[5] Yunyun Wang, Songcan Chen, Hui Xue, Structure-Embedded AUC-SVM. International Journal of Pattern Recognition and Artificial Intelligence, 24 (5): 667-690, 2010
